This model released back in March and carries a $950 MSRP these days, which we’ve mostly seen discounted to $760 during most sales, though there have been falls as low as $685 and $660 in the past. While this event continues, you can score $240 off the going rate for the third-lowest price we have tracked, which also beats out its Amazon pricing by $50. Buy for $19 (Reg. $29)

Prime-exclusive discount

What we love

If you want to add a tiny 3-in-1 MagSafe charging station in your travel bag and don’t want to break the bank while doing it, this deal is worth a peek. While it doesn’t wield Qi2.2 or even Qi2 charging speeds, the price is pretty solid given the fact that it’s made of metal and that a wall charger and USB-C cable are included in the box.

more…
